briefdescription.para: Headless mode: no window, no input, no camera, no renderer, no block, no target, no shading, no gamepad. Enable it before calling the setup method.

simplesect.para: VK_PRESENT_MODE_MAILBOX_KHR preferred over VK_PRESENT_MODE_IMMEDIATE_KHR or not
